title: Major train fault on North-South Line causing delays

updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Free regular bus svcs have ended.
[NSL] CLEARED: Train services from #JurongEast to #Yishun have resumed. Free regular bus svcs is still available.
[NSL] UPDATE: Pls add 15mins train travel time from #JurongEast to #Yishun. We are working to recover svc.
[NSL]: Due to a train fault, pls add 25mins train travel time from #JurongEast to #Yishun. (Not linked to new signalling project).
